title: d2(flex) looking for flex queue buddies to climb
body:
hi, 
i typically play alone but am in the process of looking for potential flex buddies to climb with atm

i mostly play top, mid or support, 
pls hit me up  (diamond 5 + in flex preferably as i cant queue up with any lower ranks)

ty

ign: Lelouch

replies.body:
ME me ME pick me, am bronze but can carry you. 

Hehe xd 

(For real though, GL with the climb ♥)

> [{quoted}](name=Yaiamone,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=5JiTQKnj,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-02-23T07:12:28.989+0000)

I cant because im silver in flex atm and barely play flex ahha but if u want to be my teacher you should senpai <3
